corrupted_warmaster.name: Corrupted Arch-Marine
corrupted_warmaster.description: Once one of Humanity's favoured, this powerful Marine now seeks only to watch the galaxy burn.

corrupted_champion.name: Corrupted Champion
corrupted_champion.description: A champion of the dark gods.

corrupted_champion_on_bike.name: Corrupted Champion on Bike
corrupted_champion_on_bike.description: A champion of the dark gods riding a combat bike.

corrupted_lord.name: Corrupted Lord
corrupted_lord.description: A lord of the dark gods.

corrupted_lord_on_bike.name: Corrupted Lord on Bike
corrupted_lord_on_bike.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a combat bike.

corrupted_lord_on_warbeast.name: Corrupted Lord on Warbeast
corrupted_lord_on_warbeast.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a biomechanical monster.

lord_on_demonic_spider.name: Corrupted Lord on Demonic Spider
lord_on_demonic_spider.description: A lord of the dark gods on an demon-forged spider that crawls on the ground, stalking its prey.

corrrupted_tank_commander.name: Corrupted Tank Commander
corrrupted_tank_commander.description: An armored tank helmed by a lord of the dark gods.

corrupted_juggernaut_lord.name: Corrupted Juggernaut Lord
corrupted_juggernaut_lord.description: A corrupted attack walker piloted by a lord of the dark gods, upgraded with infernal weapons.

corrupted_engineer.name: Corrupted Engineer
corrupted_engineer.description: Twisted by the dark gods, this marine is dedicated to repairing corrupted machines.

corrupted_engineer_on_bike.name: Corrupted Engineer on Bike
corrupted_engineer_on_bike.description: Riding a combat bike, this marine is dedicated to repairing corrupted machines.

corrupted_psychic.name: Corrupted Psychic
corrupted_psychic.description: A potent psychic who has turned to the dark gods.

corrupted_psychic_on_bike.name: Corrupted Psychic on Bike
corrupted_psychic_on_bike.description: A potent psychic riding a combat bike.

demonic_champion.name: Demonic Champion
demonic_champion.description: A massive demon gifted by the dark gods.

corrupted_priest.name: Corrupted Priest
corrupted_priest.description: A devotee of the dark gods who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

corrupted_priest_on_bike.name: Corrupted Priest on Bike
corrupted_priest_on_bike.description: A devotee of the dark gods on a combat bike who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

corrupted_priest_on_warbeast.name: Corrupted Priest on Warbeast
corrupted_priest_on_warbeast.description: A devotee of the dark gods on a biomechanical monster who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

corrupted_surgeon.name: Corrupted Surgeon
corrupted_surgeon.description: A battlefield medic who follows the dark gods.

corrupted_surgeon_on_bike.name: Corrupted Surgeon on Bike
corrupted_surgeon_on_bike.description: A battlefield medic on combat bike who follows the dark gods.

cultists.name: Cultists
cultists.description: Lunatics who have sold their souls to the dark gods.

cultist_berzerkers.name: Cultist Berzerkers
cultist_berzerkers.description: Rage-filled lunatics who have sold their souls to the dark gods.

plague_walkers.name: Plague Walkers
plague_walkers.description: Unfortunate souls who have been mutated into walking undead.

beastman_sorcerer.name: Beastman Sorcerer
beastman_sorcerer.description: A mutated half beast-half man sorcerer that leads demonic forces.

beastmen.name: Beastmen
beastmen.description: Mutated half beast-half man creatures that fight with the corrupted marines to achieve their goals.

corrupted_marines.name: Corrupted Marines
corrupted_marines.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

corrupted_veterans.name: Corrupted Veterans
corrupted_veterans.description: Marines that have spent long service to the dark gods.

corrupted_hazard_marines.name: Corrupted Hazard Marines
corrupted_hazard_marines.description: Elite, well-equipped marines specialized in chemical and radiological weaponry.

pestilence_marines.name: Pestilence Marines
pestilence_marines.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_destroyers.name: Pestilence Destroyers
pestilence_destroyers.description: Destroyers that are infected with pestilence.

pestilence_elite_destroyers.name: Pestilence Elite Destroyers
pestilence_elite_destroyers.description: Destroyers that are infected with pestilence.

pestilence_scout_tank.name: Pestilence Strike Vehicle
pestilence_scout_tank.description: A light demon-forged vehicle, spreading pestilence where ever it treads.

pestilence_mortar_tank.name: Pestilence Mortar Tank
pestilence_mortar_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by Pestilence Marines equipped with a deadly mortar.

corrupted_berzerkers.name: Corrupted Berzerkers
corrupted_berzerkers.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods with rage.

recon_marines.name: Recon Marines
recon_marines.description: A lightly armed and armoured squad sent to scout and sow dissent.

psychic_marines.name: Psychic Marines
psychic_marines.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_veterans.name: Psychic Veterans
psychic_veterans.description: Elite marines corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_destroyers.name: Psychic Destroyers
psychic_destroyers.description: Deadly destroyers corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

corrupted_devastators.name: Corrupted Devastators
corrupted_devastators.description: A squad of highly trained corrupted marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

corrupted_heavy_devastators.name: Corrupted Heavy Devastators
corrupted_heavy_devastators.description: A squad of highly trained corrupted marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

possessed_marines.name: Possessed Marines
possessed_marines.description: A squad of corrupted marines that have been gifted with demonic mutations to aid them in battle.

greater_possessed_marines.name: Greater Possessed Marines
greater_possessed_marines.description: A squad of corrupted marines that have been gifted with greater demonic mutations to aid them in battle.

demon_spawn.name: Demonic Spawn
demon_spawn.description: Horribly mutated beings that run rampant on the battlefield.

corrupted_assault_marine.name: Corrupted Assault Marines
corrupted_assault_marine.description: A squad of elite corrupted marines jumping into the fray with jetpacks.

corrupted_destoyers.name: Corrupted Destroyers
corrupted_destoyers.description: Destroyers that have been corrupted by the dark gods.

mutated_destoyers.name: Mutated Destroyers
mutated_destoyers.description: Destroyers that have been mutated by the dark gods.

corrupted_apc.name: Corrupted APC
corrupted_apc.description: A durable transport built by corrupted marines.

corrupted_heavy_apc.name: Corrupted Heavy APC
corrupted_heavy_apc.description: A heavy transport built by corrupted marines.

drop_pod.name: Drop Pod
drop_pod.description: A durable transport built by corrupted marines.

corrupted_heavy_gunship.name: Corrupted Heavy Gunship
corrupted_heavy_gunship.description: A heavy transport and fire support gunship.

corrupted_artillery_vehicle.name: Corrupted Artillery Vehicle
corrupted_artillery_vehicle.description: An armored artillery vehicle helmed by corrupted marines.

corrrupted_battle_tank.name: Corrupted Battle Tank
corrrupted_battle_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by corrupted marines.

corrupted_strike_tank.name: Corrupted Strike Tank
corrupted_strike_tank.description: A lighter tank with increased speed helmed by corrupted marines.

corrupted_heavy_battle_tank.name: Corrupted Heavy Battle Tank
corrupted_heavy_battle_tank.description: An heavy armored tank helmed by imperial marines.

corrupted_juggernaut.name: Corrupted Juggernaut
corrupted_juggernaut.description: A corrupted attack walker upgraded with infernal weapons.

corrupted_fiend.name: Corrupted Fiend
corrupted_fiend.description: A vicious beast of twisted metal and flesh made to dominate the battlefeild.

warp_beast.name: Warp Beast
warp_beast.description: An amalgamation of corupted flesh whose power is harnessed by a massive portal on its back.

spider_walker.name: Spider Walker
spider_walker.description: A massive siege engine in the shape of a spider.

spider_tank.name: Spider Tank
spider_tank.description: A huge demon-forged tank which is fueled by the souls of its victims.

corrupted_dragon.name: Corrupted Dragon
corrupted_dragon.description: A demon-forged dragon, created to bring down hostile aircraft with devastating attacks.

corrupted_knight.name: Corrupted Knight
corrupted_knight.description: A giant, demon-forged robot designed only to kill.

titanic_scorpion_tank.name: Titanic Scorpion Tank
titanic_scorpion_tank.description: A massive tank in the shape of a deadly scorpion. It hates you. It hates everything.

legend_mark.name: Mark of Ascension
legend_mark.description:
At the beginning of the game choose one of the following effects to be applied to this unit:
* Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
* Strength rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
* +1 Save

hatred.name: Hatred
hatred.description: Use when a unit makes a _Fight_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
hatred.flavor: Corrupted marines can launch devastating close combat assaults.

smoke_screen.name: Smoke Screen
smoke_screen.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ unit is targeted by an attack. Roll a D10 for each hit. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
smoke_screen.flavor: Naseauting smoke surrounds the demon-forged vehicles of the corrupted marines, making it difficult to spot them in the middle of a fight.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
fearless.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

infernal_pact.name: Infernal Pact
infernal_pact.flavor: Those that make pacts with the dark gods reveive blessings from beyond the veil.

mark_of_ascension.name: Mark of Ascension
mark_of_ascension.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with the Mark of Ascension.
mark_of_ascension.flavor: A powerful rune burning with the souls of the lost, granting its bearer demonic strength.

soul_cleaver.name: Soul Cleaver
soul_cleaver.description: Replace one _Leader_ model's Energy Sword(X) with the Soul Cleaver(X).
soul_cleaver.flavor: This infernal sword emits an aura of malice, dripping with demonic blood.

balefire.name: Balefire
balefire.description: Target enemy unit within 24" take 3 hits with AP(1).

unholy_strength.name: Unholy Strength
unholy_strength.description: Target friendly unit within 12" has +1 Strength until the end of the turn.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.
